text: 4.18: Ro 8.24; 2 Ko 5.7; Kor 1.16; Hi 11.1-3Nza kha rɨmanin gari bigi, nza nta nzuav gari fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza mba rɨmanin gari fhuv bigi, nza nta nzuav khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, nta nzuav gari. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Nza kha rɨmanin gari bigi, nta tuga tɨvaneŋra kegɨrga. Nza wari wo rɨmgir gari fhuv bigir vhuuiŋ, nta zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga.
